reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: I've been saying a lot of negative reviews for Mario Badescu on YouTube so I wanted to make sure to leave my review here. This stuff is amazing!! I have seasonal outdoor springtime allergies which can cause my skin to flare up in hives even while taking antihistamines. Treating hives like acne doesn't work because it's not the same and the products for acne treatment can further irritate the hives. This facial spray got rid of my hives overnight when I wore it to bed!! It's gentle, soothing, and fragrance free which is great for sensitive skin. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Basically a miracle product
reviews.comments:
I had heard the hype about hypochlorous acid but was a bit skeptical about how well it would really work. When I found this already low-cost version on sale, I figured I'd give it a shot. 

I am BLOWN AWAY by how good this has been for my skin. Ex.: No matter how careful I am about sanitizing my tools, I keep getting tiny zits/bumps whenever I pluck my brows. I tried this spray and the bumps were gone within a few hours! My skin is softer/smoother, and the bit of redness I sometimes have is gone. 

This is going to be a mainstay in my routine going forward.

*Texture and Application:*
- *Lightweight mist*: The spray has a fine, refreshing texture that absorbs quickly without leaving any residue.
- *Easy to use*: Simply spritz onto your face and neck, then follow up with your usual skincare routine.

This Repairing Facial Spray With Hypochlorous Acid has exceeded my expectations. Its unique blend of ingredients has made a noticeable difference in my skin's health and appearance. If you're looking for a product to help repair and protect your skin, I highly recommend giving this a try!

*Recommendation:*
This product is suitable for:
- Sensitive skin
- Acne-prone skin
- Dry or dehydrated skin
- Skin looking for an extra layer of protection and repair
